column3: When a man like Slafborn thinks well of you, you are wont to find yourself performing a dangerous and unpleasant task in short order.

The guildhests have gained some adherents in Revenant's Toll, but Slafborn worries that one disastrous mission will undo all that you have accomplished together. Join a particularly dangerous guildhest involving the noxious morbol, and bring it to a successful conclusion.

*The guildhest “More Than a Feeler” can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
Though your sense of smell has deserted you for what you hope is a short while, the guildhest is an unqualified success. Report the happy fact to Slafborn.

Thanks to your fellow adventurers' fondness for ale and gossip, the dispatching of the morbol is already being talked about as the finest thing ever. Slafborn declares the Guild's morale to be unwaveringly high, before slyly reminding you that this too is a kind of sorcery.
Complete the guildhest “More Than a Feeler.”

Just the <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>=man</If> I wanted to see! I received word from the guildmaster that they've seen more adventurers join a guildhest in the past moon than in the last year. She bids you thanks for your service.

Heh, but of course one good turn leads to another… we hope. There's a 'hest that might be too much for adventurers already signed on to it. Your presence could mean the difference between life and death.

There's a morbol─now, don't you roll your eyes, I've smelled my share of them!─as I was saying, there's a morbol making a nuisance of itself and needs getting rid of. Not that I've no faith in the other volunteers, but I suspect not many of them have felt the lash of a morbol's feelers before.

Ignominy isn't something we can afford at the present. We have appearances to keep up with the Scions, after all. A seasoned adventurer like you ought to know that a bad reputation's like bad breath─you can never outrun it, but nobody will ever speak frankly what ails you.
You're to complete a mission, at the Guild's behest. Join the guildhest “More Than Feelers.”

Not the most pleasant 'hest, I'll warrant, but with your prowess the morbol is likely to meet its demise without lashing the hide off some youngster first. Think what you'll do for other adventurers, and for our repute with the Scions.
You return, and smelling as sweetly, I rejoice to remark.

Your reputation precedes you. Others of your party beat you to Rowena's and there they sit, regaling all and sundry with tales of fighting alongside the legendary <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I've already signed up a score or more for new guildhests.

Revenant's Toll grows <Emphasis>and</Emphasis> prospers, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>. We are on solid ground with the Scions and ready to greet them as a Guild united. Did I not tell you, there is much magic in being prepared?
